Sentencas: Accurate three-phase identification from Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) anode micrograph is challenged by both noise and intensity inhomogeneity.
Titulo: Noise suppressed and bias field corrected image segmentation method for porous Ni-YSZ anode microstructure

Sentencas: In this paper, a novel framework is proposed for porous Ni-YSZ cermet anode Optical Microscopy (OM) image segmentation.
Titulo: Noise suppressed and bias field corrected image segmentation method for porous Ni-YSZ anode microstructure

Sentencas: The proposed framework takes advantage of a statistical model in which an observed image is decomposed into two multiplicative components (bias field and true image) and one additive component (noise).
Titulo: Noise suppressed and bias field corrected image segmentation method for porous Ni-YSZ anode microstructure

Sentencas: A two-stage Principal Component Analysis with Local Pixel Grouping (LPG-PCA) denoising algorithm is firstly performed to suppress additive noise, it can preserve more image local structural features by modeling a pixel and its nearest neighbors as a vector variable and selecting training samples with similar contents to this variable in a local window for PCA transformation.
Titulo: Noise suppressed and bias field corrected image segmentation method for porous Ni-YSZ anode microstructure

Sentencas: In order to enhance the robustness to noise, uneven illumination and other outliers, a kernel metric is introduced into fuzzy clustering method embedded with bias field correction for image segmentation.
Titulo: Noise suppressed and bias field corrected image segmentation method for porous Ni-YSZ anode microstructure

Sentencas: The proposed method has been compared to other state-of-the-art segmentation algorithms on both simulated images and real SOFC anode OM images.
Titulo: Noise suppressed and bias field corrected image segmentation method for porous Ni-YSZ anode microstructure

Sentencas: Extensive experiments results have demonstrated that the proposed framework can successfully eliminate the influence of both uneven illumination and noise on real Ni/YSZ anode OM images to obtain a better three-phase identification accuracy.
Titulo: Noise suppressed and bias field corrected image segmentation method for porous Ni-YSZ anode microstructure

Sentencas: The high-quality segmentation results lay firm foundation for accurate microstructural parameter extraction.
Titulo: Noise suppressed and bias field corrected image segmentation method for porous Ni-YSZ anode microstructure
